messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
If we were to battle, your Pokémon 
would become tougher.Likewise, my Pokémon would also
become tougher.It’s all good.
This calls for a battle!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
You know, I would have really enjoyed
a win there. Would’ve been real nice.
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
This mine’s been abandoned, but
now it’s home to many Pokémon.I guess everything finds a place
to call home someday...
